text: Sanderson is a census-designated place (CDP) in and the county seat of Terrell County, Texas, United States. The population was 664 at the 2020 census. Sanderson was created in 1882 as a part of neighboring Pecos County. It became the seat of Terrell County in 1905. == References == Category:1880s establishments in Texas Category:1882 establishments in the United States Category:Census-designated places in Texas Category:County seats in Texas
title: Sanderson, Texas
